reviewText: One of the funniest films ever made.  Really timeless in its comedy.
Probably one of the most funniest comedians from Germany with a high niveau but fun and lots of laughers for the whole family.
While I can understand some people will love this film, I don't like this kind of humour. Who said this is a funny film? No, thanks.
This was a great gift for my German-speaking father-in-law. He liked the story. It helped keep his language skills up to speed.
